allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Migrate from al-folio to Academic Pages theme

- Replace al-folio theme with Academic Pages \(Minimal Mistakes-based\)
- Remove al-folio infrastructure: layouts, includes, sass, plugins, bibliography, docker, 10 CI workflows
- Add Academic Pages theme files: layouts, includes, sass, assets
- Create 7 publication files from Google Scholar data
- Convert 4 projects to portfolio collection
- Rewrite pages: about, publications, research, portfolio, CV, 404
- Move user images to images/, PDFs to files/
- New _config.yml with github-pages gem compatibility
- Add GitHub Actions workflow for Pages deployment
- Remove blog posts per user request
- Backup branch: backup/al-folio

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
